mapper.insert: insert into student (sname, sex, grade, classId, subjectId, phone, joindate, star_num, moon_num, sun_num, supersun_num,bz) values (#{sname}, #{sex}, #{grade},#{classId},#{subjectId},#{phone},#{joindate},#{star_num},#{moon_num},#{sun_num},#{supersun_num},#{bz})
mapper.select: select sname, sex, grade, classId, subjectId, phone, joindate from student where sid = #{sid}
mapper.update: update student set sname = #{sname}, sex = #{sex}, grade=#{grade}, classId=#{classId}, subjectId=#{subjectId}, phone=#{phone}, joindate=#{joindate} where sid = #{sid}
